doc.name: ROM
doc.description: Produce an output token on each firing with a FixPoint value that is equal to the concatenation of the input bits from each input channel. The ordering of channels determines the order of the concatenation; inputs from later channels are appended to the end. The input can have any scalar type.
doc.author: Man-Kit Leung
doc.port: The address port for fetching data.
doc.property: The values that will be produced on the output. This parameter is an array, with default value {1}.
